name: Crown Wisdom
description:
Healing Frequency & Healing Visions

Re$: 2048 × 2048
Year: 2021
Collection: Transcend
Description: Transcend into the Metaverse. The world is changing, yet our bodies remain the same. As we go through this healing vibrations, colours, sound and dynamic images, we find the essential tools to heal and to adapt to the technologic era. We believe that humans are on the verge of change.

Guided Meditation:

I know that my life has purpose and meaning
I am coming to understand why I was born. 
I am discovering my gifts and talents 
and I am able to have a clearer picture 
Of how I can use my gifts to bring greater meaning 
To my life and the Collective's. 
My joy for life is rising, 
As I discover my inner powers 
How can I be used as a force for good in the world. 
I find clarity to see the big picture,
Of who I am and what I offer. 
I sincerely accept myself 
And trust that my life is unfolding 
According to this dimension. 
I am a co-creator.

By acquiring this piece, you are funding a series of courses and guided meditations to promote healing on the Metaverse.
